title: Aluma takes over late, Virginia Tech beats Virginia, 62-53 - VT hokiesports.com
content:
1. Aluma takes over late, Virginia Tech beats Virginia, 62-53  VT hokiesports.com
  2. Virginia Tech Defeats Virginia 62-53 [Men's Basketball Live Updates]  CalBearsMaven
  3. Virginia Tech knocks off Virginia behind Keve Aluma, 62-53  The Washington Post
  4. Virginia vs Virginia Tech: GAME THREAD  Streaking The Lawn
  5. Virginia vs. Virginia Tech prediction: Under the play  New York Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Keve Aluma scored 24 points and sank two clutch shots down the stretch to allow Virginia Tech to hold off Commonwealth rival Virginia, 62-53 Monday night for its sixth straight win.
